articles.title: Moors Murderer Ian Brady dies
articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Relatives of some of Brady's five child victims say his death does not end their "nightmare".

articles.title: Trump 'shared classified information with Russia'
articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: White House officials deny "intelligence sources or methods" were discussed at a meeting.

articles.title: Labour manifesto: Corbyn to unveil 'programme of hope'
articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Jeremy Corbyn is to pledge more free childcare, water nationalisation and a levy on "excessive" pay.

articles.title: WannaCry ransomware cyber-attack 'may have N Korea link'
articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Experts see apparent similarities between WannaCry and earlier hacks by a suspected North Korea-linked group.

articles.title: Picasso's Seated Woman in Blue Dress sells for $45m
articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Seated Woman in Blue Dress was rescued from the Nazis by the French Resistance.

articles.title: Rare Mexican porpoise faces 'imminent extinction'
articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: A fishing ban extension is said to be the best hope for the world's most endangered marine species.

articles.title: Road accidents biggest global killer of teenagers
articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: More than 1.2 million adolescents died in 2015, with road injuries causing about one in 10 deaths.

articles.title: General election 2017: Plaid Cymru to launch manifesto
articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The party's general election manifesto will pledge to "protect, preserve and promote" Wales.

articles.title: Enderby car crash body was schoolgirl Megan Bannister
articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Two men are held on suspicion of murdering Megan Bannister who was dead before the collision.

articles.title: Migrant in Greece : 'It is very dangerous here'
articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Many migrants in the port of Patras, Greece are prepared to take huge risks to try to reach Italy.
